name: 魏敏樺
objective:
1. 一階常微分方程
2. 二階常微分方程
3. 線性聯立微分方程
4. Laplace Transform
schedule:
週次 / Week	Topics 教學進度
1   Introduction
2   1.0 First-Order Differential Equations
     1.1 Basic Concepts and Ideas
3   1.2 Separable Differential Equations
4   1.3 Exact Differential Equations. Integrating Factors
5   1.4 Linear Differential Equations. Bernoulli Equation
6   2.0 Linear Differential Equations of Second and Higher Order
     2.1 Homogeneous Linear Equations of Second Order
     2.2 Second Order Homogeneous Equations with Constant Coefficients
7   2.3 Case of Complex Roots. Complex Exponential Function
     2.4 Euler-Cauchy Equation
8   2.6 Nonhomogeneous Equations
     2.7 Solution by Undetermined Coefficients. Solution by Variation of Parameters
9   Midterm Exam
10  3. System of Differential Equations, Phase Plane, Qualitative Methods
     3.1 Vectors, Matrices, Eigenvalues
11 3.2 Homogeneous Systems with Constant Coefficients.
12  3.2 Homogeneous Systems with Constant Coefficients.
13  3.3 Qualitative Methods for Nonlinear Systems
      3.4 Nonhomogeneous Linear System
14   4. Laplace Transforms
      4.1 Laplace Transform. Inverse Transform. Linearity. Shifting
15  4.2 Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals. Differential Equations
      4.3 Unit Step Function. Second Shifting Theorem, Dirac’s Delta Function
16  4.4 Differential and Integration of Transforms
17  4.6 Partial Fractions. Differential Equations
18  Final Exam
scorePolicy: Attendance, Homework, Quizzes, Tests, Midterm, Final Exam  : 共 100% (缺席者以零分計算)
materials:
參考書目：
1. Zill, D.G. & Wright, W.S. (2014). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. 5th Ed. The Jones and Bartlett Publishers, USA. 

2. Erwin Kreyszig (2011). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. 10th Ed. John Wiley & Sons, Inc. 

3. Peter O’Neil (2013). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. Brooks/Cole Publishing Company.
